attributes.action: Review the position of MPs found to be  miss using re-emersment of expences granted becase of their office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am deeply disappointed in the uk political class. i will not support any party who's members have taken advantage of their position, to make financial gain by distorting facts and figures, or by any other questionable means.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
